```{r open_rasters}
setwd(working.directory)
# open environmental rasters
  # region mask
  region.mask <- raster("hccrems_mask.asc")

  # vegetation
  (veg.files <- dir("vegetation", pattern="*.asc$", recursive=T, full.names=T))     
  vegetation <- raster("vegetation/final_vegetation.tif")
    vegetation <- resample(vegetation,region.mask)
  veg.rasters <- stack(veg.files,vegetation)

  # topography
  (topo.files <- dir("topography", pattern="*.asc$", recursive=T, full.names=T)) 
  topo.rasters <- stack(topo.files)

  # soils
  (soil.files <- dir("soils", pattern="*.asc$", recursive=T, full.names=T)) 
  soil.rasters <- stack(soil.files)

  # climate
  (climate.files <- dir("climate", pattern="*.tif$", recursive=T, full.names=T)) 
  climate.rasters <- stack(climate.files)

  # sampling bias layers
  (sampling.files <- dir("sampling bias", pattern="*.tif$", recursive=T, full.names=T)) 
  sampling.rasters <- stack(sampling.files)
    sampling.rasters <- resample(sampling.rasters,region.mask)

gc()
  
```


```{r standardise_rasters}
# stack all environmental rasters together
  envi.rasters<-stack(region.mask,veg.rasters, topo.rasters, soil.rasters, climate.rasters, sampling.rasters)
    envi.rasters.names <- names(envi.rasters)

# standardise rasters  
  # calculate mean raster from stack to identify all NA values
  envi.mask <- calc(envi.rasters,mean)
    envi.mask[!is.na(envi.mask)] <-1
    gc()
  
  # multiply all layers in stack by presence mask  
  envi.rasters.mask <- envi.rasters*envi.mask
    gc()

  # restack as output is a raster brick
  envi.rasters.mask <- stack(envi.rasters.mask)
    names(envi.rasters.mask) <- envi.rasters.names
    gc()
  

  # write each raster to disk
  
  for(i in 1:length(envi.rasters.names)){
    cat("\n", "Writing ",as.character(envi.rasters.names[i]), "to ", getwd())
    writeRaster(envi.rasters.mask[[i]], paste0("standardised_rasters/",envi.rasters.names[i],".asc"), overwrite=T)
        gc()
  }

cat("\n","This analysis took",round((proc.time()-start.time)[3]/60,0), "minutes to run with",length(names(envi.rasters)), "rasters.")
```


```{r correlation btwn variables}
setwd("~/GIS_data/Hunter/Maxent_files/ghm_environmental_data/standardised_rasters/")

(standardised.files <- dir("~/GIS_data/Hunter/Maxent_files/ghm_environmental_data/standardised_rasters/", pattern="*.asc$", recursive=T))
  standardised.files <- standardised.files[(grepl("sb_",standardised.files)==FALSE & grepl("hccrems",standardised.files)==FALSE)]

standardised.rasters <- lapply(standardised.files,raster) 

output <- matrix(data=NA,nrow=length(standardised.files),ncol=length(standardised.files))
rownames(output) <- standardised.files
colnames(output) <- standardised.files

for(i in seq(standardised.files)){
  raster.i <- getValues(standardised.rasters[[i]])
  cat(standardised.files[i], "\n")
  for(j in seq(standardised.files)){
    output[i,j] <- cor(raster.i,getValues(standardised.rasters[[j]]), use="complete.obs")
    cat(" ",standardised.files[j],round(output[i,j],2),"\n")
  }
}

write.csv(output,"~/GIS_data/Hunter/Maxent_files/ghm_environmental_data/standardised_rasters/correlation_matrix.csv")
```
